title: Montana Governor Signs Law Amending Infrastructure Loan Program, Related Tax Credit Rules
text:
The Montana Governor signed a law amending the infrastructure loan program and rules for related tax credits. The law includes: 1) removing eligibility for wage increases for existing employees; 2) prohibiting double-dipping on the infrastructure use fee tax credit; and 3) adding new criteria for evaluating loan applications related to infrastructure capacity. The law applies to tax credits claimed after Dec. 31. [H.B. 16, enacted 04/07/25]
